TEXT.TITLE: ALIAS RESEARCH IN CAPITAL JOINT VENTURE
TEXT.BODY: <Alias Research Inc> said it entered into a four mln dlr joint venture capital investment with several firms led by <TA Associates> of Boston. Joining TA Associates are <Greylock Management Corp>, and <Crownx> of Toronto, Alias said. Alias, which develops 3D computer graphics software, said the investment capital will be used to support ongoing research and development and to extend worldwide marketing initiatives. Reuter
